Private University Ensures Quality Student Experience With NETSCOUT

NETSCOUT's nGeniusONE® Service Assurance platform and nGeniusONE® Visibility-as-a-Service (VaaS) were the solution to these challenges, providing service assurance for the applications required, and the solution optimizes the amount of instructional time actually available in remote learning scenarios.

Threat Intelligence: Applying Actionable Information to Current Threats

Meet the leadership of our world-class ATLAS Security and Engineering Research Team (ASERT) and learn how they see the evolving threat landscape. We’ll discuss research on DDoS, botnets, and malware, providing much-needed context to the overall threat environment. Understand how NETSCOUT Threat Intelligence is uniquely targeted and curated to provide DDoS protection and mitigation tightly integrated into our solutions protecting the world's largest and most complex networks.

Using Network-Derived Data for Net/Sec Ops Collaboration & Cyber Threat Investigation

Comprehensive network visibility is a requirement for effective service assurance and cybersecurity. In this panel, our team of cybersecurity experts will discuss the value of using a common source of network-derived metadata and packets to enable NetSecOps collaboration and complement other cybersecurity technologies (i.e., SIEM, SOAR, EDR) for highly contextualized network-based threat investigation.

Case Study

One of the Largest ISPs in the US Assists Customers With DDoS Protection Through Patrolling the Network Edge

Due to the growth in cloud services and Over The Top (OTT)’ content, network traffic at most Internet Service Providers (ISPs) is being redirected to the edge of the network to decrease the costs associated with traversing the network. ISPs need to do a better job at protecting the network edge as it is not typically protected against DDoS attacks as comprehensively as the core centers of the network.
